price: 64 C’est un arbre qui prend racine au fond de la Fournaise
arabic: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٞ تَخۡرُجُ فِيٓ أَصۡلِ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: innahā shajaratun takhruju fī aṣli al-jaḥīmi
